# UIImagePickerController.CameraCaptureMode.video

**Case**

Specifies that the camera captures movies.

## Declaration

```swift
case video
```

## Constants

- **UIImagePickerController.CameraCaptureMode.photo**: Specifies that the camera captures still images.

items.description: Specifies that the camera captures still images.
items.name: UIImagePickerController.CameraCaptureMode.photo
